text: Good webinar @GHC_IHEID w. Prof Ames Dhair & @sridhartweet. Reflections on how #vaccine access would be designed if guided by #African indigenous #values such as interdependence & non-dominance. Importance of South-South collaboration & need to decolonise #globalhealth. #COVID19 https://t.co/MkYXWHY7Ng
